TextView.android:text: There are six different commands you can type each are defined below
left - The text view will be positioned to the left and will display the word left.
center - The text view will be positioned to the center and will display the word center
right - The text view will be positioned to the right and will display the word right.
WTF - The text view will have a random position, text size, and color using java.util.Random. In addition the word shown will be WTF!!.
everything else - The text view will be positioned to the center, will display the word invalid, the text displayed will be white, and the text size will be the system default.
